Employee List

First Name Last Name Email Id
{{employee.firstName}} {{employee.lastName}} {{employee.emailId}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Employee } from '../employee'; import { EmployeeService } from '../employee.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-list', templateUrl: './employee-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-list.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeListComponent implements OnInit{ employees: Employee[] = []; constructor(private employeeService: EmployeeService){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.getEmployees(); } private getEmployees(){ this.employeeService.getEmployeesList().subscribe(data => { this.employees = data; }); } }
